name: Binding Moves
flavor: You can't seem to slip from their grasp!
text: Binding moves are a group of moves that both Block the target aswell as deal damage over time to said target. A couple Items and Abilities are effected by this.
example:
All Binding Moves
- Constrict
- Wrap
- Fire Spin
- Whirlpool
- Bind
- Clamp
- Sand Tomb
- Infestation
- Magma Storm
- Snap Trap
- Thunder Cage
